name: Shuriken Showdown
description:
Shuriken Showdown has officially launched and is FREE for a limited time! The game will be priced at $.99 afterwards on all platforms.

Throw shurikens, smash targets and unleash kunai in this exciting skill puzzle game! Packed with 75 handcrafted levels and more in future updates. Do you have the discipline it takes to earn the ancient gold medals?

Key Features:
• 75 Unique Levels, 3 Challenging Worlds
• iPad, iPhone, iPod Compatible
• Amazing Gameplay Physics
• Original Graphics & Sound Effects
• New Levels, Content, and Gameplay in FREE Updates
